00034 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00035 {
00036         
00037 @private
00038         /* our chipmunk space! */
00039         cpSpace                 *_space;
00040         
00041         /* Internal devices */
00042         NSMutableArray  *_freeShapes;
00043         NSMutableArray  *_removedShapes;
00044         NSMutableArray  *_invocations;
00045 #ifdef _SPACE_MANAGER_FOR_COCOS2D
00046         Timer                   *_timer;
00047 #endif
00048         
00049         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00050         cpShape                 *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00051         cpBody                  *_staticBody;
00052         
00053         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00054         int             _steps;
00055         
00056         /* The dt used last within step */
00057         cpFloat _lastDt;
00058         
00059         /* hack to fix rehashing one static */
00060         BOOL _rehashNextStep;
00061         
00062         /* Options:
00063                 -cleanupBodyDepenencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00064                 -iterateStatic will call _iterateFunc on static shapes
00065                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00066                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00067                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00068         */
00069         BOOL                            _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00070         BOOL                            _iterateStatic;
00071         BOOL                            _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00072         cpSpaceHashIterator     _iterateFunc;
00073         cpFloat                         _constantDt;
00074 }
